title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - 18-year-old graphic designer arrested for theft; says he lost job due to AI
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: Just 5 minutes of training makes fake AI faces easier to spot
description: Five minutes of training can significantly improve people's ability to identify fake faces created by artificial intelligence, research published in the journal Royal Society Open Science shows.
content:

title: The Role of AI Tools in Supporting Modern Student Learning
description: Artificial Intelligence is becoming a key part of modern education, changing how students learn and manage academic workloads. As classrooms integrate digital resources, AI-powered tools help students work more efficiently, understand complex concepts, and build academic skills without replacing educators or independent thinking. With growing demands from coursework, research, exams, and time management, the right […]

title: Policy reforms, digital surge power India's insurance sector in 2025: Leaders
description: In 2025, India's insurance sector saw major shifts with the Sabka Bima Sabki Raksha (Amendment of Insurance Laws) Bill, 2025 enabling 100% FDI, fostering competition, alongside tech booms in Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning (AI/ML) for underwriting & claims, a surge in digital policy issuance, new products like usage-based & embedded insurance, and a significant push for enhanced regulatory governance and financial inclusion, driving massive capital inflow and market growth.
content: New Delhi [India], December 25 (ANI): As the year 2025 comes to a wrap, the insurance industry leaders bid farewell to the eventful year, calling it an inflection point mirroring broader resilience with the wider economy and are set to welcome the Ne... [4754 chars]

title: Indian FSI moving from AI pilots to production; Agentic AI to be future driver: AWS's Kiran Jagannath
description: Kiran Jagannath, Head of FSI and Conglomerates at AWS India and South Asia, stated that while the initial conversation around Artificial Intelligence (AI) focused on productivity, the narrative is shifting toward "agentic AI", autonomous agents that can execute complex tasks, which he predicts will be the dominant technology narrative in Indian banking over the next three years.

title: Samsung rules out India listing, to focus on AI-integration, interest-free finance to fuel growth
description: NEW DELHI, Dec 25: Samsung Electronics has ruled out listing of its India business for now, saying it will instead focus on accelerating artificial intelligence adoption across its products and expanding its consumer finance arm to drive sales in one of the most important growth markets.   In an interview with PTI, JB Park, President and CEO of Samsung Southwest Asia, said the South Korean giant is looking to deepen its manufacturing footprint in India and has applied under the production-linked […]

title: collar jobs lesser in India than West: IT Secretary Krishnan
description: Krishnan said AI's (Artificial Intelligence) real impact will come from building and deploying sector and use-specific applications, a process that will require large numbers of trained professionals. He added that this is where India's strength lies and where new AI-driven job opportunities will emerge.
